name: v4_sports_sport_scores
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool live_sports_odds.
Tool description: Odds data API for NFL, NBA, MLB, EPL, AFL and loads more, from US, UK, EU and Aussie bookmakers. Get started for free!
API description: Returns list of live and upcoming games for a given sport, and optionally recently completed games. Live and completed games will contain scores. **Currently in beta** and only available for selected sports. For more info, see the [list of available sports](https://the-odds-api.com/sports-odds-data/sports-apis.html)

sport.description: The sport for which to return games and scores.

daysfrom.description: The number of days in the past from which to return completed games. Valid values are integers from `1` to `3`. If this field is missing, only live and upcoming games are returned.
